name: Bugged
description:
Show your bug smashing skills in this work-from-home action puzzle game. Break the bug blocks and beat your performance score with precision clicking before time runs out. Don’t let the REAL bugs distract you as they crawl around your apartment… Crush them to relieve your stress level.
You work as a software engineer but your basically just a debugger, getting rid of bugs in other peoples software. You live in a crappy apartment that seemingly has an infinite supply of household bugs to keep your lonely self company. You're at your lowest, but now's your chance, the company is in crisis! Get promoted and become the best!

Features

  • Destroy All The Bug Blocks Before Time Runs Out! Pick the right blocks as quickly as you can. You only got one chance!



  • Procedurally Generated Sequences And Quests! Play as long as you can survive...



  • Crush Those House Bugs To Relieve Your Stress! Satisfy your urge to crush them all!



  • Don't Take Too Long To Get back to work! Your could upset your boss...



  • Get the highest performance score

  • Get promoted!

  • Get outta that damn apartment!

Features being added all the time, and more to come soon!
